summary:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Set to Launch on January 10: What to Expect?

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

Xiaomi is preparing to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 in India on January 10, 2025, featuring versatile capabilities bolstered by additional accessories like a keyboard and stylus.

Key Points:

  • 11.2-inch 3K LCD screen with 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 SoC.
  • Premium unibody metal design.
  • Runs on Xiaomi's latest HyperOS.
  • Includes a floating keyboard and a mechanical press touchpad.
  • 8850 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

India-specific Launch Details:

Xiaomi will not launch the Pad 7 Pro variant in India.

Availability:

  • Available on Amazon.in
  • mi.com
  • Offline stores across India.

Conclusion: The Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to appeal to both casual and professional users with its powerful features and design.

title: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know - Times Now
summary:
Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

Apple has requested to join Google in the ongoing antitrust case with the U.S. government, seeking to safeguard their lucrative partnership that makes Google the default search engine on Apple devices.

  • The deal, reportedly worth $20 billion annually, is critical to Apple’s business.
  • Apple claims that the association with Google ensures access to the most popular search engine for consumers.
  • Apple's entry into the antitrust case comes as Google faces pressures that may lead to its breakup.
  • The penalty phase is set for April 2025 and could reshape Apple and Google's partnership.
  • Analysts warn that losing the revenue-sharing deal could significantly impact Apple's finances.
“Should the partnership fall apart, it would harm the consumers who prefer Google’s product.”

This legal battle will determine if one of Silicon Valley's most lucrative collaborations can survive.
newTitle: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

title: Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more - DNA India
summary:
Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more

Publication Date: Not specified Source: DNA India

Vivo has launched the Y29 5G, featuring enhanced durability and impressive specifications designed for today's tech enthusiasts. Priced at Rs 13,999, it's available on Amazon and Vivo's official site.

  • The Y29 is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • IP64 rated for dust and water resistance.
  • Features Dynamic Light around the camera module for notifications.
  • Available in three colors: Diamond black, Titanium gold, and Glacier blue.
  • 6.68-inch Dotch Display with 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Robust 5500 mAh battery with 44W fast charging capability.
  • 50 MP rear camera with low-light photography enhancements.
  • Variant options: 4GB/128GB, 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB.
  • Prices for variants range from Rs 13,999 to Rs 18,999.
"The Y29's battery can maintain 80% health over 4 years, ensuring peak performance."

The Vivo Y29 5G merges affordability with advanced technology, making it a compelling choice in the smartphone market.
newTitle: Vivo Y29 5G: New Smartphone Boasting Military Grade Durability

Sam Konstas Enters Elite List, Breaks Jasprit Bumrah's Unreal 4483-Delivery Streak - NDTV Sports
summary:
Sam Konstas Enters Elite List, Breaks Jasprit Bumrah's Unreal 4483-Delivery Streak

Publication Date: December 26, 2024 Source: NDTV

In a remarkable cricketing feat, 19-year-old Sam Konstas made history by ending Jasprit Bumrah's 4483-delivery streak without being hit for a six in Test cricket. Konstas showcased his T20 skills during his debut match, scoring a half-century against India.

  • Konstas hit Bumrah for a six for the first time in three years.
  • He became the second youngest player to score a half-century for Australia in Test cricket.
  • Konstas scored 60 runs off 65 balls, with 6 fours and 2 sixes.
  • He has scored 718 runs at an average of 42.2 in his first-class career so far.
  • Konstas played a crucial role in Australia's ICC U19 World Cup triumph.
“It was a fearless innings, breaking an extraordinary record.”

Sam Konstas's achievement marks a significant moment in Australian cricket, illustrating his potential as a rising star in the sport.
newTitle: Sam Konstas Enters Elite List, Breaks Jasprit Bumrah's Unreal 4483-Delivery Streak

summary:
AAP Threatens to Remove Congress from INDIA Alliance Over Ajay Maken Controversy

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In a major setback for opposition unity, the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has announced intentions to request Congress's removal from the INDIA alliance if it does not take action against its Delhi leader, Ajay Maken.

  • AAP accuses Congress of facilitating BJP's electoral success ahead of the Delhi Assembly elections.
  • Allegations arise that Ajay Maken's statements align with BJP's agenda.
  • The face-off follows previous cooperation between AAP and Congress during the Lok Sabha elections.
  • AAP demands action against Maken within 24 hours or will seek Congress's removal from the alliance.
“All limits have been crossed,” said MP Sanjay Singh regarding Maken’s comments.

This situation highlights growing tensions within the opposition, as AAP asserts its stance against Congress's perceived alignment with BJP interests.

iPhone 16 selling at the lowest price ever - India Today
summary:
iPhone 16 Selling at the Lowest Price Ever

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 16 is currently being sold at a record-low price. Here's what you need to know about this limited-time offer.

  • The iPhone 16 is priced at Rs 77,400, down from the launch price of Rs 79,999, offering a discount of Rs 2,599.
  • Additional discounts of Rs 5,000 are available for payments made with ICICI, Kotak, or SBI Bank cards, bringing the price down to Rs 72,400.
  • An exchange offer is available for up to Rs 65,790, depending on the condition and age of the old phone being traded in.
  • The iPhone 16 features Apple Intelligence, the latest A18 chip, and a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display.
  • Camera capabilities include a 48MP main and a 12MP ultra-wide rear camera, along with a 12MP front camera.
  • It is also IP68-rated for durability against water and dust.
“Croma is running an exchange offer of up to Rs 65,790.”

This limited-time offer makes the iPhone 16 an attractive purchase, especially with the added discounts and features it offers.
newTitle: iPhone 16 Selling at the Lowest Price Ever

title: India map distorted at Belagavi Congress meet? BJP launches attack - Deccan Herald
summary:
BJP Criticizes Congress for Allegedly Distorted Map at Belagavi Meeting

Published: 26 December 2024, Source: Deccan Herald

The Congress held a significant two-day Congress Working Committee meeting in Belagavi, Karnataka, marking the 100th anniversary of the Belgaum session. The event attracted criticism from the BJP for allegedly displaying a distorted map that depicted Kashmir as part of Pakistan.

  • The meeting focuses on the legacy of Mahatma Gandhi and asserts Congress' commitment to his principles.
  • BJP leaders claim the alleged map distortion shows Congress' disrespect for India's sovereignty.
  • Notable comments from BJP leaders emphasize this as part of a larger problem of Congress aligning with anti-India forces.
“This clearly shows Congress' alliance with the forces that are dividing India into parts.” – Sudhanshu Trivedi, BJP MP
“Once again Congress sings Pakistan tune.” – Shehzad Poonawalla, BJP leader

The Congress party also plans to discuss perceived insults towards B.R. Ambedkar during the meeting.
newTitle: BJP Criticizes Congress for Allegedly Distorted Map at Belagavi Meeting

Russian air defence or bird strike: What happened to the Azerbaijan Airlines flight that crashed in Kazakhastan? - The Indian Express
summary:
Russian air defence or bird strike: What caused Azerbaijan Airlines flight to crash?

Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Indian Express

A tragic plane crash in Kazakhstan has claimed the lives of 38 passengers, with conflicting reports regarding its cause, prompting investigations from both Russian and Azerbaijani authorities.

  • The Azerbaijan Airlines flight was en route to Grozny from Baku and crashed near the Caspian Sea.
  • UK-based Osprey Flight Solutions suggested that a Russian military air-defense system may have shot down the plane.
  • Russian authorities are exploring the possibility of a bird strike as the cause for the crash.
  • An investigation is ongoing, with the black box recovered to aid in determining the cause.
  • Social media footage shows the plane engulfed in flames prior to crashing.
“Video of the wreckage and the circumstances around the airspace security environment in southwest Russia indicates the possibility the aircraft was hit by some form of antiaircraft fire.” - Matt Borie, chief intelligence officer, Osprey Flight Solutions

The investigation into the incident is still in its early stages, and it has highlighted tensions and questions surrounding aviation safety in the region.
newTitle: Investigation into Azerbaijan Airlines Flight Crash Raises Concerns

title: AAP-Delhi Congress conflict puts INDIA bloc on shaky grounds - The Hindu
summary:
AAP-Delhi Congress Conflict Puts INDIA Bloc on Shaky Grounds

Published: December 26, 2024 12:32 pm IST

Source: The Hindu

The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) is considering withdrawing from the INDIA alliance if Congress does not act against its leader Ajay Maken, who has been criticized for his statements against AAP and for allegedly collaborating with the BJP.

  • AAP officials, including Chief Minister Atishi, expressed dissatisfaction with Congress's actions.
  • AAP claims Maken is echoing BJP sentiments and demands his removal from the alliance.
  • Atishi accused Congress candidates of receiving financial support from the BJP for Delhi Assembly elections.
  • Maken publicly stated it was a mistake for Congress to align with AAP in the recent elections.
“We demand the Congress to take action against Ajay Maken in 24 hours, else we will demand other parties in the INDIA bloc to remove Congress from the alliance.” - Sanjay Singh

The ongoing conflict raises questions about the stability of the INDIA bloc and the future of cooperation among these political parties amidst accusations and allegations.

title: ICAI CA Final Result 2024 LIVE Updates: Did ICAI announce CA Final result releasing time? - The Indian Express
summary:
ICAI CA Final Result 2024 LIVE Updates

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Indian Express

The ICAI CA Final results for November 2024 will be available on the official website icai.org. Candidates need to log in with their roll and registration numbers or pin numbers to access their results and the merit list.

  • The total number of candidates who appeared for ICAI CA Group 1 final exam in 2023 was 65,294.
  • Out of these, only 6,176 candidates passed, resulting in a pass percentage of 9.46%.
  • In Group 2, the total number of candidates was 62,679, with 13,540 passing, giving an overall pass percentage of 21.6%.

title: What did Sam Konstas say on the Virat Kohli shoulder-bump altercation? - The Times of India
summary:
What did Sam Konstas say on the Virat Kohli shoulder-bump altercation?

Date: Thursday, December 28, 2024 | Source: Times of India

A physical altercation occurred between Virat Kohli and debutant Sam Konstas during the fourth Test match between Australia and India at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The incident escalated following an aggressive run by Konstas, who scored 60 runs and had a shoulder-to-shoulder collision with Kohli.

  • Konstas faced off against India's top bowler Jasprit Bumrah and drew attention with his aggressive batting style.
  • The altercation began after a shoulder bump between Konstas and Kohli.
  • Usman Khawaja intervened to calm the heated exchange.
  • Ricky Ponting commented that Kohli instigated the confrontation.
  • Konstas later downplayed the incident, citing cricketing emotions.
“I think the emotions got to both of us. I didn't quite realise, I was doing my gloves, then a little shoulder charge, but it happens in cricket.” - Sam Konstas

Despite the tension, both teams are focusing on a vital five-match series that is currently tied at 1-1.
newTitle: Sam Konstas and Virat Kohli's Tense Moment at the MCG

The launch of the Vivo Y29 5G marks an important step in offering affordable yet durable smartphones in India.

title: 'No Compromise On Law And Order': Revanth Reddy To Telugu Film Body Amid Pushpa 2 Row - News18
summary:
No Compromise On Law And Order: Revanth Reddy To Telugu Film Body Amid Pushpa 2 Row

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: News18

The Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy met with representatives of the Telugu film industry regarding the recent stampede incident during the premier of 'Pushpa 2'. He emphasized that there will be no compromise concerning law and order in the state.

  • The meeting was attended by several prominent film producers and directors.
  • CM Reddy urged the film industry to promote investments and support the anti-drugs campaign.
  • The discussion followed a tragic stampede which resulted in a fatality.
  • BJP MP Anurag Thakur criticized attempts to undermine Telugu actors, citing their contributions to Indian cinema.
  • There are concerns regarding the Congress government's approach to the film industry, with allegations of targeting and extortion.
Something troubling is unfolding in Telangana under the Revanth Reddy-led Congress government. The administration appears to be targeting Tollywood... — Amit Malviya, December 25, 2024

The situation reflects broader issues of governance and transparency in the film industry, with calls for a safer and more supportive environment for filmmakers.
newTitle: No Compromise On Law And Order: Revanth Reddy To Telugu Film Body Amid Pushpa 2 Row

title: South Korea opposition says it will vote to impeach acting President Han - Reuters
summary:
South Korea Opposition to Impeach Acting President Han Duck-soo

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Reuters

The South Korean opposition party plans to vote on a bill to impeach acting President Han Duck-soo, citing his unqualified handling of the constitution amid a deepening political crisis.

  • Democratic Party to introduce impeachment bill on Thursday.
  • Han criticized for failure to appoint justices to the Constitutional Court.
  • First impeachment trial hearing for President Yoon scheduled for Friday.
"It has become clear that Prime Minister and acting President Han Duck-soo does not have the qualification or the will to safeguard the Constitution," said Democratic Party floor leader Park Chan-dae.

This impeachment move adds to the ongoing tensions in South Korean politics, particularly following the impeachment of President Yoon Suk Yeol over martial law declarations.
newTitle: South Korea Opposition to Impeach Acting President Han Duck-soo

summary:
M.T. Vasudevan Nair bids adieu: Life, works, and honours

Published on: December 26, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

M.T. Vasudevan Nair, a Jnanpith Award winner, known for elevating Malayalam storytelling, passed away on December 25, 2024, at the age of 91. He had been hospitalized due to heart failure and suffered from various health issues.

  • MT is celebrated for his profound storytelling and exploration of human emotions.
  • He made significant contributions to Malayalam literature and cinema.
  • His works reflect the complexities of rural life and culture.
“His storytelling explored human emotions and the complexities of rural life.”

His death marks the end of an era in Malayalam literature and cinema, leaving behind a rich legacy.

title: India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 4th Test Day 1: Jasprit Bumrah picks Mitchell Marsh, AUS 250/5 vs IND in Melbourne - The Indian Express
summary:
India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 4th Test Day 1: AUS 311/6 vs IND at Stumps in Melbourne

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

On Day 1 of the 4th Test in Melbourne, Australia scored 311 runs for 6 wickets at stumps after opting to bat in hot conditions. Notable performances include debutant Sam Konstas, who scored 60 runs with an aggressive style.

  • Australia was placed at 176 for 2 at tea.
  • Sam Konstas made a strong debut with an opening stand of 89 runs.
  • Pat Cummins opted to bat first on a green-tinged pitch.
  • India made several changes, bringing in Washington Sundar to strengthen their bowling options.
“Konstas played three audacious reverse scoops over slips, hitting two fours and a six.”

The match is part of the ongoing series, currently tied at 1-1 after a draw in Brisbane.
